attributes.title: Yeah
attributes.review: Awful app, i was reading the reviews and let’s just say the app crashes every 5 minutes, it’s been turning my phone on and off and stole my credit card number

attributes.title: oof
attributes.review: the app made my phone smell like Cheetos and not like the good ones the ones that you get from the dollar store... it also gave my phone a virus called the republican and blue lives matter which was not fun to get rid of...

attributes.title: Destroy this Stupid App
attributes.review: Who decided it was a good idea to make this man an app. Better yet who decided he would be a good president. He treats immigrants like terrorists. He also treats being president as a celebrity status and not a government leader. Also I saw his spray tan pic and his 🍆 looks like a shriveled Cheeto

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep up with this countries president only to find out that it was downloading my bank info to an unknown source. The worst decision I have even made!!! I now have to file for bankruptcy😢

attributes.title: SO DISAPPOINTED
attributes.review: As a privilege, straight, Christian, republican, I was BEYOND disappointed when I downloaded the app. I opened the app to multiple pop ups and felt pressured to vote trump. That should happen. I should feel convinced to vote not pressured. Thank you and have a blessed day 💓

attributes.title: Hell no.
attributes.review: Absolutely disgusting. The type of things this app is recommending and showing is going to corrupt out kids forever. The president is as stupid as a raisin. I don’t want a preside who doesn't care about most lifenof his own country.

attributes.title: Least racist app EVER: all the BEST words too!
attributes.review: This app is the BEST ever in a negative way. It’s failed all the tests in a positive way, and it’s passed the rest in a negative way! This app has already Made America Great Again. I’m not even sure Trump needs to run anymore! ☹️

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This app takes so long to load and pop up adds keep asking for my email and credit card number

attributes.title: Love it😁
attributes.review: This is a great App. The information presented is so true. Don’t miss out.

attributes.title: Why?
attributes.review: Why do I need to provide my employment information for this app? Why would they track where I buy goods and services? It states they do both these things in the Privacy Policy. Why?
